A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie insults the intelligence of Star Wars fans and movie-lovers alike and irreparably defaces the franchise.  Nothing about this movie feels like Star Wars.  The movie is a potpourri of sight gags\, bad comedy\, and cheap gimmicks rather than what Star Wars has traditionally been: a sophisticated and well-crafted hero's journey.  Characters act like buffoons\, and the plot is full of holes and ridiculousness.\n\nThis is not just a bad Star Wars movie...It's a bad movie altogether!
